job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtDutiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtYou will join the department of AIClient within Research BiologyltligtltligtYou will collaborate with scientists working on different areas of machine learning and the life sciencesltligtltligtYou will closely collaborate with machine learning scientists computational chemists and bioinformaticians across departments in the organizationltligtltligtYou will develop and deploy deep learning methods for representation learning of small molecules and prediction of chemical propertiesltligtltligtThe work will also involve software development infrastructure and hardware optimizations data pipelining and innovations to implement robust AI solutions for real world use casesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkillsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDemonstrated experience with deep learning frameworks and models PyTorch is preferredltligtltligtProficient in PythonltligtltligtDemonstrated experience in software development GPU acceleration model optimization and scaling for multiple server nodesltligtltligtExcellent communication and collaboration skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtEducationltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMSc or PhD degree in a quantitative field eg Computer Science Computational Chemistry Machine Learning Statistics Mathematics PhysicsltligtltligtIndustry experience as data scientist or Client engineer in a healthcare companyltligtltligtExperience in deep learning for graphbased andor sequencebased dataltligtltligtExperience in deep learning for small moleculesltligtltulgt
